text: A filing under this chapter signed by a domestic entity shall become part of the public organic document of the entity if the entity's organic law provides that similar filings under that law become part of the public organic document of the entity.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Editor's Notes

Former § 29-201.05 has been recodified as § 29A-201.05.

DC CODE § 29-201.05

Current through December 11, 2012
